item.title: Paper
item.description: See also researchmap. Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy nanoparticles by high-repetition-rate UV picosecond laser ablation in water Atsuya Watanabe, Tomoyuki Yatsuhashi Journal of Alloys and Compounds 950, 169896 (2023). 10.1016/j.jallcom.2023.169896 Microstructure and tensile strength of electrodeposited Fe-rich bcc FeCoNi medium-entropy alloys A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, R. Miyamoto, Y. Takigawa Materials Science and Technology, 39, (15) 2028-2034 (2023). 10.1080/02670836.2023.2187973 10.2139/ssrn.3972720 Tensile strength of nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy fabricated using electrodeposition A. Watanabe, T.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: See also researchmap. Scheduled in future Grain growth bihavior in electrodeposited nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy Atsuya Watanabe, Takahisa Yamamoto, Koichiro Nambu, Yorinobu Takigawa IFHTSE2023, 2023-11-15. 2023 めっき法によるバルクナノ結晶FeCoNiミディアムエントロピー合金の創製 渡邉充哉, 山本剛久, 瀧川順庸 第30回機械材料・材料加工技術講演会(M&P2023) 2023-09-28. Development of high-strength bulk nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy via electrodeposition Atsuya Watanabe, Takahisa Yamamoto, Yorinobu Takigawa International Symposium of Graduate School of Engineering, Osaka Metropolitan University, Osaka, 2023-09-20. 水中レーザーアブレーションによるコアシェル型FeCoNiミディアムエントロピー合金ナノ粒子の鎖状構造形成 八ツ橋知幸, 渡邉充哉 光化学討論会, Hiroshima, 2023-09-06. 2023 Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy by laser ablation in water using UV picosecond laser pulses
